sprint_goal: Establish the core service skeleton, database model, and containerization for the Order Management service, creating a deployable foundation for business logic.
Implement the order state machine with immutable logging and publish all state changes as events to the message bus.
Enable the end-to-end order creation flow, including real-time inventory checks and payment intent, and allow the system to react to external events from the Payment and Logistics services.
Achieve production readiness by fully automating the deployment pipeline and implementing the complete observability stack, including logging, metrics, and tracing.
